find_centre_of_mass¶

clustertools.analysis.operations.find_centre_of_mass(cluster)[source]¶

NAME:

find_centre_of_mass

PURPOSE:

Find the centre of mass of the cluster

Parameters

None

Returns

xc,yc,zc,vxc,vyc,vzc - coordinates of centre of mass

HISTORY:

2018 - Written - Webb (UofT)
